Awards & Recognition

Honors and recognition received for contributions to robotics, AI, and mechatronics.

Outstanding Innovation in Robotics

International Robotics Association

September 2023

Awarded for developing a novel approach to robot learning from demonstration that significantly reduces training time while improving task performance.

Download Certificate

Best Paper Award

IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA)

May 2023

Recognized for the paper 'Deep Reinforcement Learning for Autonomous Mobile Robot Navigation in Dynamic Environments' as the most innovative research contribution.

Download Certificate

Young Researcher of the Year

National Council for Science and Technology

December 2022

National recognition for outstanding contributions to the field of robotics and artificial intelligence by a researcher under 35 years of age.

Download Certificate

Technology Innovation Grant

Global Robotics Foundation

August 2022

Competitive grant awarded to fund research on autonomous robotic systems for applications in disaster response scenarios.

Download Certificate

Academic Excellence in Engineering

Tecnológico de Monterrey

June 2022

Recognition for outstanding academic achievements and contributions to the university's engineering research programs.

Download Certificate

Industry Impact Award

Association for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence

February 2022

Awarded for developing AI algorithms that have been successfully implemented in industrial robotics applications with measurable productivity improvements.

Download Certificate
MechaRobotics

Specializing in mechatronics engineering with a focus on robotics, AI, computer vision, and ROS2 development.
